org.enhydra.shark.api.internal.errorhandler

Interface ErrorHandler


  • public interface ErrorHandler
    Handles errors during automated activity execution.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int ERROR_KEEP_ACTIVITY_RUNNING 
      static int ERROR_PROPAGATE 
      static int ERROR_TERMINATE_ACTIVITY 
      static int ERROR_TERMINATE_PROCESS 

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(CallbackUtilities cus)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Method configure is called at Shark start up, to configure implementation of ErrorHandler.
        Parameters:
        cus - an instance of CallbackUtilities used to get properties for configuring error handler in Shark.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown if configuring doesn't succeed.

      • handleError

        int handleError(WMSessionHandle shandle,
              WfActivityInternal act,
              java.lang.Throwable error)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        shandle -
        act - WfActivityInternal object where the error happened.
        error - the error thrown by the automated activity.
        Returns:
        flag specifying what should kernel do: terminate activity/terminate process/ignore error/propagate error. Default is to propagate error.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in the case something unexpected happens
